The Crucial (Micron) MX100 is a SA T A SSD released in 2014. It supports A T A security, as well as TCG Opal, both version 1 and 2.
The Crucial (Micron) MX100 is a SA T A SSD released in 2014. It supports A T A security, as well as TCG Opal, both version 1 and 2.
The Crucial MX200 is a SA T A SSD released in 2015. It is essentially an MX100 with some write performance advantages.
The Crucial MX200 is a SA T A SSD released in 2015. It is essentially an MX100 with some write performance advantages.
The Crucial MX300 is a SA T A SSD released in 2016. Similar to both its predecessors, it supports the A T A security feature set, as well as TCG Opal version 1 and 2.
The Crucial MX300 is a SA T A SSD released in 2016. Similar to both its predecessors, it supports the A T A security feature set, as well as TCG Opal version 1 and 2.
The Sandisk X600 is a SA T A SSD released in December 2017. It is built around the same Marvell 88SS1074 controller as the Crucial MX300. The X600 supports both A T A security and TCG Opal version 2.
The Sandisk X600 is a SA T A SSD released in December 2017. It is built around the same Marvell 88SS1074 controller as the Crucial MX300. The X600 supports both A T A security and TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung 840 EVO is a SA T A SSD released in 2013. It supports A T A security, as well as TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung 840 EVO is a SA T A SSD released in 2013. It supports A T A security, as well as TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung 850 EVO is a SA T A SSD released in 2014. Similar to the 840 EVO, it supports TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung 850 EVO is a SA T A SSD released in 2014. Similar to the 840 EVO, it supports TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung 950 PRO is an NVMe SSD released in late 2015. It supports TCG Opal version 2.
The Samsung T3 portable SSD is an external drive connected through USB-3.1 Gen 1. It offers optional password protection through a proprietary command set.
The Samsung T5 portable SSD is the successor of the T3. It uses the same MGX controller found in the 850 EVO and the T3.
